roleset.name: make/become deeper

example.name: deepen-v: pro-agentive
example.text: But it does that at the cost of *trace* deepening the taxpayer's exposure if the FHA is forced to pay for more loans going sour.
example.arg: if the FHA is forced to pay for more loans going sour.

example.name: deepen-v: ergative
example.text: UAL fell $6.25 a share to $191.75 on volume of 2.3 million shares in composite trading on the New York Stock Exchange as concern deepened among takeover stock traders about the length of time it will take to revive the purchase.
example.arg: about the length of time it will take to revive the purchase.

example.name: deepening-n: Noun with arg1
example.text: A deepening of the ice saturated region.

roleset.note: DEEPEN-V NOTES: EXT, start/end points? I have no intuitions, and wsj doesn't provideexamples. Bogus. (from deepen.01-v)

roleset.name: extending/located at a great distance (esp. downward)

example.name: deep-j: both args
example.text: The book was deep in the corner of the religion and occult practices shelf, which Chris had asked about before.
example.arg: in the corner of the religion and occult practices shelf,
which Chris had asked about before.

example.name: deep-j: both args, abstract
example.text: He was very deep into the issues and how it must come out.

example.name: deep-j: arg1, LOC
example.text: In 1900 the glacier was 100 ft. deep where the road is.

example.name: deep-j: arg1, CXN
example.text: The cut was so deep [*0*] I was surprised it was n't fully decapitated .
example.arg: was surprised it was n't fully decapitated

example.name: deep-j: abstract
example.text: But that sadness was deep and constant, rooted from stem to stern and laced through every rib in between.
example.arg: rooted from stem to stern and laced through every rib in between.

example.name: deepest-j: lexical superlative, with LOC
example.text: Finally , Europe is the benchmark of human civilization ; take for instance this occasion crisis which [*] is deepest of Greece = Greece which is in the deepest crisis this time -- this is the cradle of the democratic system , would we be able to just watch wide - eyed as the democratic system went bankrupt ? Absolutely no way !

roleset.note: DEEP.02 NOTES: This roleset has been split (into deep.06 and deep.07) and discontinued starting in 2020 with SpatialAMR. See usage notes.
DEEP-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5; superlative found in BOLT-6. Related to deepen.01. (from deep.01-j)
DEEPEST-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from deepest.01-j)

example.name: deep-j: both args
example.text: Also, I thought the book was deep in foreshadowing .

example.name: deep-j: arg1
example.text: "He was a very conscientious member of council, "Davies said. "He was very deep and sensitive to the issues that came before the council."

roleset.name: low in pitch

example.name: deep-j: arg1
example.text: His voice was deep and husky when he spoke her name.

roleset.note: DEEP-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from deep.03-j)

roleset.name: aesthetically rich

example.name: deep-j: arg1
example.text: It was used as both as a yellow dye, whose color was deep and lasting

roleset.note: DEEP-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from deep.04-j)

roleset.name: spatial dimension: Arg1 has a quantifiable dimension called 'depth'

example.name: deep-j: arg1, LOC
example.text: In 1900 the glacier was 100 ft. deep where the road is.
example.amr: (d / deep-06 :ARG1 (g / glacier) :ARG3 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 100 :unit (f / foot)) :time (d3 / date-entity :year 1900) :location (r / road)))

example.name: depth-n
example.text: The shelf had a depth of 8" .

example.name: deep-j
example.text: 50 feet is deep for a swimming pool.

example.name: deep-j: arg1, CXN
example.text: The cut was so deep [*0*] I was surprised it was n't fully decapitated .
example.arg: was surprised it was n't fully decapitated
example.amr: (h / have-degree-91 :ARG1 (c / cut) :ARG2 (d / deep-06) :ARG3 (s / so) :ARG6 (s2 / surprise-01 :ARG0 (d2 / decapitate-01 :polarity - :ARG1 (i2 / it) :extent (f / full)) :ARG1 (i / i)))

example.name: deep-j: abstract
example.text: But that sadness was deep and constant, rooted from stem to stern and laced through every rib in between.
example.arg: rooted from stem to stern and laced through every rib in between.
example.amr: (c / contrast-01 :ARG2 (a / and :op1 (d / deep-06 :ARG1 (s / sad-02 :mod (t / that))) :op2 (c2 / constant :domain s) :op3 (r / root-02 :ARG1 s :source (s2 / stem) :destination (s3 / stern)) :op4 (l / lace-01 :ARG1 s :path (t2 / trajectory :ARG4-of (t3 / through-02 :ARG2 (r2 / rib :mod (e / every) :ARG1-of (b / between-01)))))))

roleset.note: DEEP.06 NOTES: This roleset was split off of deep.02 starting in 2020 with SpatialAMR. See usage notes.
DEEP-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5; superlative found in BOLT-6. Related to deepen.01. (from deep.01-j)
DEEPEST-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from deepest.01-j)

roleset.name: location: Arg1 is located probably far downward or inward within a probably vast substance/space

role.descr: entity located in a deep place

example.name: deep-j
example.note: In this interpretation, the submarine is located 50 ft. below the surface of the water.
example.text: The submarine was 50 ft. deep.

example.name: depth
example.text: They were at a depth of 1 mile under the sea.
example.amr: (d / deep-07 :ARG1 (t / they) :ARG2 (s / sea :ARG2-of (u / under-01 :ARG1 t)) :ARG3 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 1 :unit (m / mile)))

example.name: deep-j: with the scale
example.text: 100 feet is deep for a freediver to go .
example.amr: (d / deep-07 :ARG3 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 100 :unit (f / foot)) :ARG5 (g / go-02 :ARG0 (p / person :ARG0-of (f2 / freedive-01))))

example.name: deep-j: both args
example.text: The book was deep in the corner of the religion and occult practices shelf, which Chris had asked about before.
example.arg: in the corner of the religion and occult practices shelf,
which Chris had asked about before.
example.amr: (d / deep-07 :ARG1 (b / book) :ARG2 (s / space :ARG1-of (c / corner-02 :ARG2 (s2 / shelf :mod (r / religion) :mod (p / practice-01 :ARG1 (o / occult))))))

example.name: deep-j: both args, abstract
example.text: He was very deep into the issues and how it must come out.
example.amr: (d / deep-07 :ARG1 (h / he) :ARG2 (a / and :op1 (i2 / issue-02 :pl +) :op2 (w / way :ARG2-of (c / come-out-09 :ARG1 (i3 / it) :ARG1-of (o / obligate-01)))) :degree (v / very))

example.name: deep-j: both args, abstract
example.text: extended to the deep biopsy margin
